bibl.title: The Grain Market in the Roman Empire. A Social, Political and Economic Study.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 225-237: Rome and the Corn Provinces: Egypt (Flavius Josephus and Egypt's grain; - The uses of Egypt's grain). - P. 364: Index locorum. Papyri.
bibl.seg: ERDKAMP Paul, The Grain Market in the Roman Empire. A Social, Political and Economic Study.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2005, 8°, xiv-364 pp., 5 cartes. ISBN 0-521-83878-9. £55.
